tool_description: Combines validated questions, logic rules, and scales into a complete, deployable survey with proper sequencing and formatting.

question_sequence.description: Ordered list of question IDs for survey flow

allow_back_navigation.description: Allow respondents to go back to previous questions

theme.description: Visual theme: professional, modern, minimal, or branded

mandatory_completion.description: Require all mandatory questions to be answered

time_limit.description: Survey time limit in minutes (0 = no limit)

error_messages: Survey template not found: The specified survey_id does not exist
Invalid question sequence: One or more question IDs in question_sequence are invalid
Too few questions: Minimum 3 questions required for a valid survey
Too many questions: Maximum 100 questions allowed per survey
Invalid theme: Must be one of [professional, modern, minimal, branded]
Logic conflicts detected: Survey logic rules create unresolvable conflicts
Invalid time limit: time_limit must be 0 (no limit) or between 5 and 180 minutes
usage: Provide survey_id and question_sequence array. Configure display options with include_progress_bar, allow_back_navigation, save_and_continue. Set theme and completion requirements. Returns a complete survey ready for deployment.

assembled_survey_id.description: Unique identifier for the assembled survey

total_questions.description: Total number of questions in the assembled survey

survey_url.description: URL for accessing the assembled survey

deployment_status.description: Current deployment status of the survey
